title: CUNY Graduates With Tech Degrees Struggle to Land Tech Jobs
description: Students at the City University of New York are increasingly graduating with degrees in technology. A new report details the obstacles they face in landing jobs.
dc:creator: Steve Lohr
media:credit: Karsten Moran for The New York Times
media:description: The big break for Faisal Farooq, a CUNY graduate, came after he answered a TaskRabbit ad. That work experience helped lead to his current job at Amazon.
